be informed his desires to get the Matrix, altough he mentions that was for=
 us I think that the right pronoun is he... He must be observed in a discre=
te way, i wont let him go close to the Ark, the slightes tampering in the w=
rong way and all=A0is doomed, and we dont know a lot about Scourge and Cycl=
onus; I'll insist Hydras, that let us go me and Darkhawk but=A0I need someo=
ne watching Zarak, but that would be after we=A0get all the info that we ca=
n from=A0that Auto-fool=A0"

Dark Rodimus nodded as he stroked his goatee, =
happy that Perceptor was
trusting him that much to watch over Zarak, but tr=
ying to hide it at
the same time.

"So you need me to stay behind and keep =
an eye on him, Gotcha!"
Rodimus said, giving Perceptor a 'thumbs up' gestur=
e. "He kinda gives
me the creeps though, all dark and brooding. He never le=
ts me get to
close to him, but I will do my best."

Rodimus glanced down th=
e hall in the direction of Cyclonus and
Scourge, "As for those two, I don't=
 like 'em. I know they USED to be
Decepticons, but they are the spawn of Un=
icron. And now they come
crawling back to the Decepticons! How can we trust=
 'em?"

********************************

Looking down the hall, Cyclonus a=
nd Scourge are talking about
something, although every few moments Scourge =
glances up at Perceptor
and Rodimus. Even with his hearing he can't tell wh=
at's being said,
but deep in his inner processor he knows they are talking =
about him.

"You'll get yours boy" Scourge grumbled under his breath about
=
Rodimus, "Just you wait"

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge/Dark Rodimus)
